projectGridLines.stationName: Grasim Industries Ltd. (Chemical Division) CPW & SBP
projectGridLines.title: Bottleneck study in CPW for capacity enhancement
projectGridLines.description:
Bottleneck study in CPW for capacity enhancement

The goal is to pinpoint bottlenecks in the production line, operational areas that limit output

Project domain (IT, Finance, etc.)

Production

Project area

Production VAP (CPW)

Skill set required to execute the project (Technical)

Basic knowledge of chemical engineering

Other soft skill competencies required

Learning agility, precision

Expected learning (in bullet points)

·        Understanding of CPW production

·        Root Cause Identification

·        Workflow improvement
